lead_paragraph: GORMLEY--Joseph B.,81, of Queens Village on March 26, 2016. Loving husband of Alice. Beloved father of Mary (Nick), Joe (Patti), Alice (Ed), Joan (Bernie), Bernadette (Charlie), Jim, Eddie (Hanna), Jeany (Bobby), Sue (Jorge). Cherished grandfather of 21 and great- grandfather of three. Visiting Tuesday 2-4pm and 7-9pm at R. Stutzmann & Son Funeral Home, 224-39 Jamaica Ave., Queens Village. Funeral Mass Wednesday 9:45am, Incarnation RC Church. Interment to follow Mt. St. Mary's Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to Little Sisters of the Poor and St. Vincent de Paul. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GORMLEY, JOSEPH B.
